source_id: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_022_chunk7
evidence_span: The metallurgical condition of Zircaloy tubing is controlled in part by the degree of cold work prior to the final annealing treatment and by the annealing conditions.

source_id: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_022_chunk7
evidence_span: A nonlinear relationship was obtained between the "normalized annealing time" and the in-reactor diametral and axial strains.

source_id: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_022_chunk7
evidence_span: The high-temperature yield strength of Zircaloy is routinely included in the Zircaloy tubing manufacturer's certifications and can be easily measured.

source_id: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_022_chunk7
evidence_span: There is a semilogarithmic relationship between the in-reactor diametral strain and the hot (673 K) yield strength of Zircaloy.

source_id: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_022_chunk7
evidence_span: A similar correlation was obtained between the axial strain and the unirradiated yield strength.
